entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 9:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
